attributes.action: hold a referendum for the withdrawal of the UK from the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the earliest opportunity the Government of the UK should hold a referendum on the complete withdrawal of the UK from the EU. Resulting in the repelling of all rules, regulations and laws introduced by this countries membership.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
